mapper.sql: ID, CU_ID, MAC, AUTH_TYPE, REMARK, ACTIVE_KEY, CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into etv_repeat_auth (ID, CU_ID, MAC, AUTH_TYPE, REMARK, ACTIVE_KEY, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into etv_repeat_auth
ID,
CU_ID,
MAC,
AUTH_TYPE,
REMARK,
ACTIVE_KEY,
CREATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update etv_repeat_auth
CU_ID = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_TYPE = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_KEY = #{activeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update etv_repeat_auth set CU_ID = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_TYPE = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_KEY = #{activeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ra.ID id, cu.CU_COMPANY_NAME companyName, MAC mac, AUTH_TYPE authType, REMARK remark, ACTIVE_KEY activeKey, CREATE_TIME createTime from etv_repeat_auth ra inner join etv_customer cu on cu.id=ra.cu_id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')>= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')<= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and cu.CU_COMPANY_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ltrim(rtrim(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))),'%')
